content:
This PR changes another CommRing instance to Semiring in the file Mathlib.RingTheory.Ideal.QuotientOperations.

For docs#quotientKerEquivRange, the first isomorphism theorem for ring morphisms, the CommRing instance on the target was necessary because it uses docs#RingHom.range. I left that one intact but added a variant quotientKerEquivRangeS which uses docs#RingHom.rangeS when the target is just a Semiring.

There is no modification in the proofs, except for that of docs#RingHom.kerLift_injective whose proof required subtraction. However that lemma was a weaker version of docs#RingHom.lift_injective_of_ker_le_ideal and it is now is deduced from it.
